Welcome to SPICE Engineering!

Created by Wesley Erickson, Dileep Reddy, and Andrea Yocom. Generated by and template remixed from Jekyll. Hosted on Github. Licensed by Creative Commons (CC BY-NC 4.0). Transistor, resistor, FSR, and LED images and a transistor schematic are borrowed as-is from Simon Monk at Adafruit Industries under CC BY 2.0, while the breadboard was borrowed and altered (highlighted) with inspiration from the Arduino Info Wikispace under CC BY-NC 3.0 and the Arduino Nano graphic was borrowed as is from Wikipedia Commons, photo by David Mellis on Flickr under CC BY 2.0
